attributes.name: Musket of Unseen Power
attributes.description: "I did not see where the shot came from, only the aftermath."
attributes.parsed_description: "I did not see where the shot came from, only the aftermath."

attributes.name: Musselcracker
attributes.description: "Cracking open shells has never been easier. Though you have to be careful if you want anything inside to still be intact."
attributes.parsed_description: "Cracking open shells has never been easier. Though you have to be careful if you want anything inside to still be intact."

attributes.name: Mutineer's Reward
attributes.description: "So you seek to rebel against Musselbeard? Well then, you'll get a fiery prize."
attributes.parsed_description: "So you seek to rebel against Musselbeard? Well then, you'll get a fiery prize."

attributes.name: Muttering Madness
attributes.description: "They speak to themselves not for comfort, but because they are trying to understand some grand design only they can see."
attributes.parsed_description: "They speak to themselves not for comfort, but because they are trying to understand some grand design only they can see."

attributes.name: Named Dryads Bow Of the Dryad and Dryad
attributes.name_with_affixes: Named Dryads Bow Of the Dryad and Dryad
attributes.description: @2hBow_NamedDryadsBowOftheDryadandDryadT4_Description
attributes.parsed_description: @2hBow_NamedDryadsBowOftheDryadandDryadT4_Description

attributes.name: Natrual Order
attributes.description: "The berserker stalked the wilds, defending the land and defeating any who may seek to descrate her forest."
attributes.parsed_description: "The berserker stalked the wilds, defending the land and defeating any who may seek to descrate her forest."

attributes.name: Natural Formation
attributes.description: "There are no hammer marks or imperfections. It's as if it sprung from the earth itself, ready to fight alongside you."
attributes.parsed_description: "There are no hammer marks or imperfections. It's as if it sprung from the earth itself, ready to fight alongside you."

attributes.name: Natural Selection
attributes.description: "That which is not born of nature has no home here."
attributes.parsed_description: "That which is not born of nature has no home here."

attributes.name: Nature's Justice
attributes.description: "Nature cares not for your intentions, only for your results."
attributes.parsed_description: "Nature cares not for your intentions, only for your results."

attributes.name: Nature's Shield
attributes.description: "To protect the sleeping land, steep mountains sprang forth, covered in thorny brambles, halting their path forward."
attributes.parsed_description: "To protect the sleeping land, steep mountains sprang forth, covered in thorny brambles, halting their path forward."

attributes.name: Nature's Truth
attributes.description: "Nature cares not for your morals."
attributes.parsed_description: "Nature cares not for your morals."

attributes.name: Nature's Wrath
attributes.description: "The wilds have a way of defending themselves when danger is present."
attributes.parsed_description: "The wilds have a way of defending themselves when danger is present."

attributes.name: Needler
attributes.description: "Sew some clothes or stitch some flesh, it's all the same to me."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sew some clothes or stitch some flesh, it's all the same to me."

attributes.name: Needle Threader
attributes.description: "Firing an arrow is like threading a needle through a fine linen. You must be perfect lest you ruin the whole tapestry."
attributes.parsed_description: "Firing an arrow is like threading a needle through a fine linen. You must be perfect lest you ruin the whole tapestry."

attributes.name: Neverending Winter
attributes.description: "I remember the day clearly. It was a joyous day, a day of celebration. And the next day, the sun did not rise, nor would it again."
attributes.parsed_description: "I remember the day clearly. It was a joyous day, a day of celebration. And the next day, the sun did not rise, nor would it again."

attributes.name: New Dawn
attributes.description: "A new day is here, let us rejoice."
attributes.parsed_description: "A new day is here, let us rejoice."

attributes.name: Newfound Hope
attributes.description: "We sailed across the sea looking for a better life. We never thought we'd end up stuck here."
attributes.parsed_description: "We sailed across the sea looking for a better life. We never thought we'd end up stuck here."

attributes.name: Newfound Longing
attributes.description: "What would the world think of this power? To them, we are as gods now."
attributes.parsed_description: "What would the world think of this power? To them, we are as gods now."

attributes.name: Nguyen's Notched Spear
attributes.description: "What is yours shall soon belong to The Taker."
attributes.parsed_description: "What is yours shall soon belong to The Taker."

attributes.name: Night Terror
attributes.description: "It captures the feeling of lying frozen in bed, unable to free yourself from the nightmares."
attributes.parsed_description: "It captures the feeling of lying frozen in bed, unable to free yourself from the nightmares."

attributes.name: Nightwatcher's Staff
attributes.description: "The warm glow of the staff serves to comfort you in the darkest of places."
attributes.parsed_description: "The warm glow of the staff serves to comfort you in the darkest of places."

attributes.name: Nightweaver
attributes.description: "The magical energies of Aeternum sing a different song at night. Nightweaver seems to shine a bit brighter when the sun goes down."
attributes.parsed_description: "The magical energies of Aeternum sing a different song at night. Nightweaver seems to shine a bit brighter when the sun goes down."

attributes.name: Nimbusight
attributes.description: "The winds are picking up. Head for shore and don't look back."
attributes.parsed_description: "The winds are picking up. Head for shore and don't look back."

attributes.name: Noble's Brand
attributes.description: "All the elegance of a noble, and all the viciousness too."
attributes.parsed_description: "All the elegance of a noble, and all the viciousness too."

attributes.name: Noble's Decorative Sword
attributes.description: "My father gave me this, hoping I would never use it. I managed not to. Will you?"
attributes.parsed_description: "My father gave me this, hoping I would never use it. I managed not to. Will you?"

attributes.name: Noble's Hunting Bow
attributes.description: "For when you need to prove your prowess and wealth."
attributes.parsed_description: "For when you need to prove your prowess and wealth."

attributes.name: Noblewoman's Ogre Hunter
attributes.description: "She would leave the settlement for days at a time, and each time she returned she brought with her the carcass of a colossal ogre."
attributes.parsed_description: "She would leave the settlement for days at a time, and each time she returned she brought with her the carcass of a colossal ogre."

attributes.name: No Remorse
attributes.description: "My only regret is that I did not kill you sooner."
attributes.parsed_description: "My only regret is that I did not kill you sooner."

attributes.name: Noxious Great Axe
attributes.description: "You feel sick just looking at this weapon."
attributes.parsed_description: "You feel sick just looking at this weapon."

attributes.name: Nyhart's Hatchet
attributes.description: "The great freebooter Nyhart is most famous for their anchorage, but tales of their deadly hatchet still haunt the seven seas."
attributes.parsed_description: "The great freebooter Nyhart is most famous for their anchorage, but tales of their deadly hatchet still haunt the seven seas."

attributes.name: Oath of the Pacifist
attributes.description: "No harm shall be done today. Not to you, and not to me."
attributes.parsed_description: "No harm shall be done today. Not to you, and not to me."

attributes.description: A bow found in the Starstone Barrows.
